name: Mad Carnage
description: Can YOU survive the Mad Carnage?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista 32-bit newer Processor: Intel Core i3-2100T @ 2.50 GHz / AMD Phenom II X3 B73 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4850 or NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GT Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
